sentences.en: Have the nautical chart at your fingertips, and you'll be able to steer your ship.
He tried to steer her into the bedroom, but she understood his intentions and refused to move.
sentences.cn: 他试图引她进卧室, 可她明白他的意图而不肯去.

sentences.en: He was steering with only one hand.
his programme steers clear of prickly local issues.
sentences.cn: 他的方案避开了棘手的地方问题。

sentences.en: I think a lot of people, women in particular, steer clear of these sensitive issues.
sentences.cn: 我认为很多人，特别是女性，都会回避这些敏感问题。

sentences.en: I think you are perfectly correct in trying to steer your mother towards increased independence.
sentences.cn: 我认为你试图引导你母亲变得更加独立是完全正确的。

sentences.en: I'm trying to lose weight so I have to steer clear of fattening foods.
sentences.cn: 我想減肥,所以得避免吃增肥食品.

sentences.en: If you push the car, I'll steer it.
sentences.cn: 如果你来推车, 我就来驾车.

sentences.en: It's no use trying to steer the boy into a course of action that suits you.
sentences.cn: 想说服这孩子按你的方式行事是徒劳的.

sentences.en: Lieutenant Campbell ordered the man at the wheel to steer for the gunboat.
sentences.cn: 坎贝尔上尉命令舵手将船开向炮艇。

sentences.en: Prime Minister Hun Sen has sought to steer a course between the two groups.
sentences.cn: 洪森首相设法游走于两个集团之间。

sentences.en: The book tries to steer you through the maze of alternative therapies.
sentences.cn: 本书旨在就各种非传统疗法为您指点迷津。

sentences.en: The Cutty Sark rolled from side to side and it became impossible to steer her.
sentences.cn: 卡蒂萨克号向两侧摇晃着,驾驶这只船是不可能的了.

sentences.en: The rabbis try to steer clear of political questions.
sentences.cn: 拉比们努力避开政治问题。

sentences.en: Try to steer the boat for the harbor.

sentences.cn: 在我小时候，大概六七岁时，她经常让我在自家的车道上开车。

sentences.en: You are perfectly correct in trying to steer your mother towards increased independence.
sentences.cn: 你试图让自己的母亲变得越来越独立，这样做很正确。
